TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITextRangeProvider

summary.span: 公開方法與屬性，以支援使用者介面自動化用戶端在實作 的文字容器中存取一段連續的文字。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to a span of continuous text in a text container that implements .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在必須支援的 UI 自動化提供者上實作控制項模式。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern. A的插入點、 的子集或所有中的文字可以代表容器。A can represent an insertion point, a subset, or all of the text in a container.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddToSelection ();

Public Sub AddToSelection ()
public: void AddToSelection();

summary.span: 加入至文字容器中反白的文字集合，此容器支援多次斷續選取。

span.span: Adds to the collection of highlighted text in a text container that supports multiple, disjoint selections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文字插入點移動至新的選取範圍的區域。The text insertion point moves to the area of the new selection. 提供變質文字範圍移動插入點。Providing a degenerate text range moves the insertion point.

exception.span: 如果文字提供者不支援多次斷續選取 (也就是說， 的值必須為 )。

span.span: If text provider does not support multiple, disjoint selections (that is, must have a value of ).

span.span: Returns a value that specifies whether two text ranges have identical endpoints.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ExpandToEnclosingUnit (System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit unit);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ExpandToEnclosingUnit(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit unit) cil managed
Public Sub ExpandToEnclosingUnit (unit As TextUnit)
public: void ExpandToEnclosingUnit(System::Windows::Automation::Text::TextUnit unit);

span.span: The textual unit.

summary.span: 將文字範圍擴展至指定的文字單元。

span.span: Expands the text range to the specified text unit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果範圍中的指定單位的精確數量則保持不變。If the range is already an exact quantity of the specified units then it remains unchanged. 沒有一系列的步驟會在幕後順序方法才能成功執行。There is a series of steps are involved behind the scenes in order for the method to execute successfully. 1. 文字範圍已正規化；也就是，文字範圍已在 端點摺疊為變質範圍，以致 端點變成多餘的。The text range is normalized; that is, the text range is collapsed to a degenerate range at the endpoint, which makes the endpoint superfluous. 這個步驟是必要情況下，文字範圍跨越`unit`界限; 例如，"{The U} RL [ https://www.microsoft.com/ ](https://www.microsoft.com/)內嵌在文字"其中"{"和"}"是文字範圍端點。This step is necessary to remove ambiguity in situations where a text range spans `unit` boundaries; for example, "{The U}RL [https://www.microsoft.com/](https://www.microsoft.com/) is embedded in text" where "{" and "}" are the text range endpoints. 2. 結果產生的範圍會在 中向後移至所要求 `unit` 界限的開頭。The resulting range is moved backward in the to the beginning of the requested `unit` boundary. 3. 範圍會在 中依所要求的 `unit` 界限數目向前或向後移動。The range is moved forward or backward in the by the requested number of `unit` boundaries. 4. 範圍會接著依一個要求的 `unit` 界限移動 端點，從變質範圍狀態展開。The range is then expanded from a degenerate range state by moving the endpoint by one requested `unit` boundary. ![由 Move 和 expandtoenclosingunit 進行的範圍調整](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "由 Move 和 expandtoenclosingunit 進行的範圍調整")![Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit") 如何針對 Move() 和 ExpandToEnclosingUnit() 調整文字範圍的範例Examples of how a text range is adjusted for Move() and ExpandToEnclosingUnit() > [!NOTE] > 這些步驟是必要的因為它是很常見的螢幕助讀員讀取完整單字、 句子或整個段落插入點或任何虛擬的游標位置。These steps are necessary since it is common for a screen reader to read out a full word, sentence, or entire paragraph at the insertion point or any virtual cursor position. 尊重隱藏和顯示文字。 respects both hidden and visible text. 延後到下一個最大如果給定控制項不支援。 defers to the next largest supported if the given is not supported by the control. 如下所示的順序，從最大、 最小單位。The order, from smallest unit to largest, is listed below. - - - - - - -

span.span: The text attribute.

summary.span: 從整個文字範圍中擷取指定屬性的值。

span.span: Retrieves the value of the specified attribute across the text range.

span.span: Retrieves an object representing the value of the specified attribute.

returns.span: 例如，GetAttributeValue(TextPattern.FontNameAttribute) 會傳回代表文字範圍之字型名稱的字串，而 GetAttributeValue(TextPattern.IsItalicAttribute) 會傳回 類型的值。

span.span: For example, GetAttributeValue(TextPattern.FontNameAttribute) would return a string that represents the font name of the text range while GetAttributeValue(TextPattern.IsItalicAttribute) would return a value of type .

returns.span: 如果指定之屬性的值在文字範圍內會變動，則傳回 。

span.span: Returns if the value of the specified attribute varies over the text range.

returns.span: 如果提供者或控制項不支援指定的屬性，則傳回 。

span.span: Returns if the specified attribute is not supported by the provider or the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在隱藏與顯示的文字之間沒有差異。There is no differentiation between hidden and visible text.

span.span: If the specified attribute is not valid.

span.span: An empty array for a text range that has screen coordinates placing it completely off-screen, scrolled out of view, or obscured by an overlapping window.

span.span: Children that overlap with the text range but are not entirely enclosed by it will also be included in the collection.

span.span: Returns an empty collection if there are no child objects.

span.span: However, if the text provider supports child elements such as tables or hyperlinks, then the enclosing element could be a descendant of the text provider.

Public Function GetText (maxLength As Integer) As String
public: System::String ^ GetText(int maxLength);

param.name: maxLength
param.span: 傳回之字串的最大長度。

span.span: The maximum length of the string to return.

param.span: 如果不需要限制，請使用 -1。

span.span: Use -1 if no limit is required.
Retrieves the plain text of the range.

returns.span: 文字範圍的純文字，可能會依指定的 截斷。

span.span: The plain text of the text range, possibly truncated at the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尊重隱藏和顯示文字。 respects both hidden and visible text. 如果`maxLength`大於的長度是呼叫端的文字範圍內，傳回的字串會是個文字範圍的純文字。If `maxLength` is greater than the length of the text span of the caller, the string returned will be the plain text of the text range. 不會影響順序文字流向; 中的端點它一定會傳回邏輯文字流程順序中的文字範圍的開始和結束端點之間的文字。 will not be affected by the order of endpoints in the text flow; it will always return the text between the Start and End endpoints of the text range in the logical text flow order.

span.span: If is less than -1.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Move (System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit unit, int count);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Move(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit unit, int32 count) cil managed
Public Function Move (unit As TextUnit, count As Integer) As Integer
public: int Move(System::Windows::Automation::Text::TextUnit unit, int count);

span.span: The text unit boundary.

param.name: count

span.span: The number of text units to move.

param.span: 正值會將文字範圍向前移動，負值會將文字範圍向後移動，0 沒有作用。

span.span: A positive value moves the text range forward, a negative value moves the text range backward, and 0 has no effect.

summary.span: 將文字範圍移動指定的文字單元數。

span.span: Moves the text range the specified number of text units.

returns.span: 實際移動的單元數。

span.span: The number of units actually moved.

returns.span: 如果新的文字範圍端點大於或小於 端點，則此值會小於要求的數目。

span.span: This can be less than the number requested if either of the new text range endpoints is greater than or less than the endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需周遊文字範圍的內容，則應在幕後執行一連串的步驟，才能成功執行 方法。When it is necessary to traverse the content of a text range, a series of steps are involved behind the scenes in order for the method to execute successfully. 1. 文字範圍已正規化；也就是，文字範圍已在 端點摺疊為變質範圍，以致 端點變成多餘的。The text range is normalized; that is, the text range is collapsed to a degenerate range at the endpoint, which makes the endpoint superfluous. 這個步驟是必要情況下，文字範圍跨越`unit`界限; 例如，"{The U} RL [ https://www.microsoft.com/ ](https://www.microsoft.com/)內嵌在文字"其中"{"和"}"是文字範圍端點。This step is necessary to remove ambiguity in situations where a text range spans `unit` boundaries; for example, "{The U}RL [https://www.microsoft.com/](https://www.microsoft.com/) is embedded in text" where "{" and "}" are the text range endpoints. 2. 結果產生的範圍會在 中向後移至所要求 `unit` 界限的開頭。The resulting range is moved backward in the to the beginning of the requested `unit` boundary. 3. 範圍會在 中依所要求的 `unit` 界限數目向前或向後移動。The range is moved forward or backward in the by the requested number of `unit` boundaries. 4. 範圍會接著依一個要求的 `unit` 界限移動 端點，從變質範圍狀態展開。The range is then expanded from a degenerate range state by moving the endpoint by one requested `unit` boundary. ![由 Move 和 expandtoenclosingunit 進行的範圍調整](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "由 Move 和 expandtoenclosingunit 進行的範圍調整")![Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit") 如何針對 Move() 和 ExpandToEnclosingUnit() 調整文字範圍的範例Examples of how a text range is adjusted for Move() and ExpandToEnclosingUnit() 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 樹狀目錄的控制項檢視和內容檢視 (例如超連結或表格儲存格) 中，文字容器和內嵌物件的文字內容 (或內部文字) 會公開為單一連續的文字資料流； 物件界限會被忽略。The textual content (or inner text) of a text container and an embedded object, such as a hyperlink or table cell, is exposed as a single, continuous text stream in both the control view and the content view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree; object boundaries are ignored. ![合併的內嵌物件的文字範圍。](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-embeddedobjecttextranges.png "合併內嵌物件的文字範圍。")![Text ranges spanned by embedded objects.](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-embeddedobjecttextranges.png "Text ranges spanned by embedded objects.") 具有內嵌物件及其範圍的文字資料流範例Example of a text stream with embedded objects and their range spans 尊重隱藏和顯示文字。 respects both hidden and visible text. 延後到下一個最大如果給定控制項不支援。 defers to the next largest supported if the given is not supported by the control. 如下所示的順序，從最大、 最小單位。The order, from smallest unit to largest, is listed below. - - - - - - - 文字不會改變以任何方式，只是文字範圍擴展的不同部分文字。The text is not altered in any way, the text range just spans a different part of the text.

MemberSignature.Value: public void MoveEndpointByRange (System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint endpoint, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextRangeProvider targetRange, System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint targetEndpoint);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void MoveEndpointByRange(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint endpoint, class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextRangeProvider targetRange, valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint targetEndpoint) cil managed
Public Sub MoveEndpointByRange (endpoint As TextPatternRangeEndpoint, targetRange As ITextRangeProvider, targetEndpoint As TextPatternRangeEndpoint)

public: void MoveEndpointByRange(System::Windows::Automation::Text::TextPatternRangeEndpoint endpoint, System::Windows::Automation::Provider::ITextRangeProvider ^ targetRange, System::Windows::Automation::Text::TextPatternRangeEndpoint targetEndpoint);

span.span: The endpoint to move.

param.name: targetRange
param.span: 來自相同文字提供者的另一個範圍。

span.span: Another range from the same text provider.
An endpoint on the other range.

summary.span: 將文字範圍的一個端點移至第二個文字範圍上指定的端點。

span.span: Moves one endpoint of a text range to the specified endpoint of a second text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果移動端點置於相同的文字範圍的另一個端點則導致變質範圍，以及確保端點的正確順序也，移動其他端點 (也就是一定會小於或等於).If the endpoint being moved crosses the other endpoint of the same text range then that other endpoint is moved also, resulting in a degenerate range and ensuring the correct ordering of the endpoints (that is, is always less than or equal to ).

MemberSignature.Value: public int MoveEndpointByUnit (System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint endpoint, System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit unit, int count);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 MoveEndpointByUnit(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint endpoint, valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit unit, int32 count) cil managed
Public Function MoveEndpointByUnit (endpoint As TextPatternRangeEndpoint, unit As TextUnit, count As Integer) As Integer
public: int MoveEndpointByUnit(System::Windows::Automation::Text::TextPatternRangeEndpoint endpoint, System::Windows::Automation::Text::TextUnit unit, int count);

span.span: The endpoint to move.
The textual unit for moving.

param.name: count

span.span: The number of units to move.

param.span: 正值會將端點向前移動。

span.span: A positive value moves the endpoint forward.
A negative value moves backward.
A value of 0 has no effect.

summary.span: 在文件範圍內，將文字範圍的一個端點移動指定的文字單元數。

span.span: Moves one endpoint of the text range the specified number of text units within the document range.

returns.span: 實際移動的單元數，如果移動端點會碰到文件的開頭或結尾，則會小於要求的數目。

span.span: The number of units actually moved, which can be less than the number requested if moving the endpoint runs into the beginning or end of the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需周遊文字範圍的內容，則應在幕後執行一連串的步驟，才能成功執行 方法。When it is necessary to traverse the content of a text range, a series of steps are involved behind the scenes in order for the method to execute successfully. 1. 文字範圍已正規化；也就是，文字範圍已在 端點摺疊為變質範圍，以致 端點變成多餘的。The text range is normalized; that is, the text range is collapsed to a degenerate range at the endpoint, which makes the endpoint superfluous. 這個步驟是必要情況下，文字範圍跨越`unit`界限; 例如，"{The U} RL [ https://www.microsoft.com/ ](https://www.microsoft.com/)內嵌在文字"其中"{"和"}"是文字範圍端點。This step is necessary to remove ambiguity in situations where a text range spans `unit` boundaries; for example, "{The U}RL [https://www.microsoft.com/](https://www.microsoft.com/) is embedded in text" where "{" and "}" are the text range endpoints. 2. 結果產生的範圍會在 中向後移至所要求 `unit` 界限的開頭。The resulting range is moved backward in the to the beginning of the requested `unit` boundary. 3. 範圍會接著依一個要求的 `unit` 界限移動 端點，從變質範圍狀態展開。The range is then expanded from a degenerate range state by moving the endpoint by one requested `unit` boundary. ![由 Move 和 expandtoenclosingunit 進行的範圍調整](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "由 Move 和 expandtoenclosingunit 進行的範圍調整")![Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit") 如何針對 Move() 和 ExpandToEnclosingUnit() 調整文字範圍的範例Examples of how a text range is adjusted for Move() and ExpandToEnclosingUnit() 延後到下一個最大如果給定控制項不支援。 defers to the next largest supported if the given is not supported by the control. 如下所示的順序，從最大、 最小單位。The order, from smallest unit to largest, is listed below. - - - - - - -

MemberSignature.Value: public void RemoveFromSelection ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveFromSelection() cil managed
Public Sub RemoveFromSelection ()
public: void RemoveFromSelection();

summary.span: 從支援多次斷續選取的文字容器中反白的文字集合，移除反白的文字區段，此區段對應至呼叫端的 和 端點。

span.span: Removes a highlighted section of text, corresponding to the caller's and endpoints, from the collection of highlighted text in a text container that supports multiple, disjoint selections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除反白顯示的區域，將文字插入點。The text insertion point will move to the area of the removed highlight. 提供變質文字範圍，將會移動插入點。Providing a degenerate text range will move the insertion point.

exception.span: 如果文字提供者不支援 Multiple，則為斷續的選取範圍 (例如， 必須擁有 這個值)。

span.span: If text provider does not support multiple, disjoint selections (for example, must have a value of ).

MemberSignature.Value: public void ScrollIntoView (bool alignToTop);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ScrollIntoView(bool alignToTop) cil managed
Public Sub ScrollIntoView (alignToTop As Boolean)
public: void ScrollIntoView(bool alignToTop);

param.name: alignToTop
param.span: 如果應該捲動文字控制項，讓文字範圍與檢視區的頂端齊平，則為 ；如果應該與檢視區的底端齊平，則為 。

span.span: if the text control should be scrolled so the text range is flush with the top of the viewport; if it should be flush with the bottom of the viewport.

summary.span: 導致文字控制項垂直捲動，直到在檢視區看到文字範圍為止。

span.span: Causes the text control to scroll vertically until the text range is visible in the viewport.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尊重隱藏和顯示文字。 respects both hidden and visible text. 如果隱藏的文字範圍，文字控制項將捲動隱藏的文字檢視區中有一個錨點。If the text range is hidden, the text control will scroll only if the hidden text has an anchor in the viewport.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Select ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Select() cil managed
Public Sub Select ()
public: void Select();

summary.span: 反白文字控制項的文字，此文字對應至文字範圍的 和 端點。

span.span: Highlights text in the text control corresponding to the text range and endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果提供變質文字範圍，文字插入點會移至文字範圍的結束點。If a degenerate text range is provided, the text insertion point will move to the endpoint of the text range.

exception.span: 發生於文字控制項不支援文字選取範圍時。

span.span: Occurs when text selection is not supported by the text control.
